title: 248 Chieng` Ma Bu Mar Nyasachwa Noyuagi

lines: 1. Chieng` ma bu mar Nyasachwa noyuagi e ndalo giko,Chieng`no e ma piny noyawre, nyaka chieng`;Chieng`no jo mowar nochokre e dho wadh aoch ngima.Ka iluongo nying jo maler nabedie!
Ka iluongo nying jo maler(nabedie)!Ka iluongo nying jo maler (nabedie)!Ka iluongo nying jo maler,Ka iluongo nying jo maler, nabedie!
2. Chieng`no ma jo maler duto nowinji dwond bu kayuak.Giniwuogi ka gia e lietegi;Eka ginichokre kanyakla e dalano maler;Ka iluongo nying jo maler, nabedie!
3. Watiuru ni Yesu gi kinda nyaka oduogi;Walanduru herane kwonde duto;Eka chieng`no ma tichne duto norum e pinyni,Ka iluongo nying jo maler, nabedie!
